data.text: @CDPHE Have you ever passed by a person smoking a cigarette while you are wearing a mask and could still smell the foul odor of smoke? I ask you then, if a mask can't stop cigarette smoke odor, HOW is it going to stop a virus floating around in the air?
@CDPHE Thanks for telling us how much tax payer money you wasted.
@sleeplessincol2 @CDPHE Preach! At least they have each other to pat on the back and have stopped to stroking their own egos on social media.
@CDPHE Please go away. Your credibility is shot yet you continue to push a narrative that has been debunked. Perhaps a little reflection is warranted.
@CDPHE Thank you for spending my money on shit I didn't vote for.
@CDPHE Do you even know what a micron is? https://t.co/CRpaNQMeRC
